title: Temporal and Spatial Specification
text: Resource allocation in large-scale farming. We lead advanced strategies in professional agriculture. We start work before sunrise during harvest. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. We record yields and monitor feed intake. We evaluate evidence and ensure regulatory compliance. We coordinate complex cross-border operations. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. In winter we protect equipment from freezing.

multiple_choice.question: What do we check every morning?
What protects animals in cold weather?
What do we rotate to improve forage?
Where do we grow plants with climate control?
